data.message:
As I sit back and think of all the struggles I've surpassed
Long nights on the streets only the strong will last
Life ripped apart by mistakes but my hope has been lifted
These blessing along the way for the Lord has been gifted
He gives me strength in my veins and calms my soul
Took the demons out of my life and made me once again whole 
He overlooked all the bad and never judged me one day
I thank him daily as I drop to my knees and pray
I started from the bottom but I'm heading for the stars 
Leave the bullshit behind all that's left is the scars
Memories along the way are there to remind me of the past
Living life to the fullest everyday like it's my last
They say what don't kill you makes you stronger and builds strength along the way
Always appreciate what you have and be thankful your here everyday
It can all be taken in a second no matter who you are
All the money in the world can only get you so far
Respect is the key, be humble and always do what is right
Put faith in the Lord and don't forget to thank him every night
He's watching over us all and never judges or compares
You only get one life no since of living scared
Decision along the way bring us up or make us fall
Everything happens for a reason there's a chance for us all

I write alot of poems and lyrics and would love a chance to write for you im one of your biggest fans. David VanZandt 816-803-6261
